title: Government Planning To Fly Back Indians From Abroad After Lockdown

title: Gurgaon Multinationals May Have To Work From Home Till July-End: Official

title: After Bored Driver Plays Cards With Friends, 24 Infected With COVID-19
description: A social grouping for whiling away time by another truck driver resulted in the virus affliction to about 15 people in another locality in Vijayawada.
